Now officially releasing the MCUBE WebRTC Extension Persistent Window, your one place for communication convenience and effective work. Keep your session alive with this Chrome extension that preserves the state when you log in and close it, then reopen. It does away with the necessity of reconnecting or resetting, helping in better flow and productivity. Offering easy facilitation and user-friendly experience communication to customer engagement so as well overall interactions since you use MCUBE Dialer Extension!

Key Features:

Receive client calls directly through our main panel using WebRTC technology for real-time communication.

Automatically reopens the extension window in the same state after closure, maintaining uninterrupted connectivity and user settings.

Utilizes a secure API for user authentication and interaction with our dialer system, ensuring data privacy and reliability.

Improves productivity with an easy-to-use dialer interface for efficient customer interactions.

Features an intuitive design that simplifies navigation and improves user experience during customer engagements.


Support:
You can reach MCUBE support at support@mcube.com.
